permissionsScreen.title: Permissions
permissionsScreen.heading: Allow Access
permissionsScreen.permissionsBody: This app will send you notifications and use your location to provide the best experience. Please press the button below and grant access.

welcomeScreen.missionStatement: We strive to provide the Oakland Chinatown Community with a resource for promoting safety and community. We aim to embrace the often forgotten, underserved, and vulnerable. We promote compassion not indifference, unity as opposed to divisiveness. Fostering a more caring and safer Oakland for all.

signUpScreen.title: Sign up
signUpScreen.emergencyContact: Emergency Contact (Name, Phone number, and Relationship)
signUpScreen.signUpRequesterOption: Requester - I would like to request help from chaperones
signUpScreen.signUpChaperoneOption: Chaperone - I want to help my community as a chaperone

roleSelectScreen.title: Role Select
roleSelectScreen.chaperoneDescription: I would like to be a chaperone
roleSelectScreen.requesterDescription: I would like to request a chaperone.

requestDetailScreen.title: Request Details
requestDetailScreen.requestPending2: We’ll let you know when you have been matched.
requestDetailScreen.youAreMatched: You’re all set! You have been matched.

homeScreen.title: Home
homeScreen.noneScheduledNoticeBold: You currently don’t have anything scheduled.
homeScreen.noticeText2: Chaperones cannot be requested within 48H of desired day.
homeScreen.noticeText3: You could make a immediate request by calling
homeScreen.noticeText4: or you can schedule a chaparone request.

chaperoneHomeScreen.noOpenRequests: There are currently no open requests. Pull down to refresh.
chaperoneHomeScreen.noScheduledRequests: You currently have no scheduled requests
chaperoneHomeScreen.acceptRequestsDescription: Allow notifications to be sent to you when new requests arrive

demoScreen.title: What’s In This Stack?
demoScreen.tagLine: Congratulations, you’ve got a very advanced React Native app template here.  Take advantage of this boilerplate!
demoScreen.androidReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running, run adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 from your terminal, and reload the app.
demoScreen.iosReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running and reload app.
demoScreen.macosReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running and reload app.
demoScreen.webReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running and reload app.
demoScreen.windowsReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running and reload app.

userAgreementScreen.title: User Agreement
userAgreementScreen.userAgreement: This user agreement is a contract between you and Compassion. governing your use of your Compassion account and the Compassion services. It applies to U.S. Compassion accounts only. If you are an individual, you must be a resident of the United States or one of its territories and at least 18 years old, or the age of majority in your state of residence to open a U.S. Compassion account and use the Compassion services. If you are a business, the business must be organized in, operating in, or a resident of, the United States or one of its territories to open a U.S. Compassion account and use the Compassion services. By opening and using a Compassion account, you agree to comply with all of the terms and conditions in this user agreement. The terms include an agreement to resolve disputes by arbitration on an individual basis. You also agree to comply with each of the other agreements on the Legal Agreements page that apply to you and the following additional policies.

resetPasswordScreen.title: Reset Password
resetPasswordScreen.savedNotice: Your new password has been saved!
